note.p: Birth: Attercliffe, near Sheffield, Yorkshire, England (09 August 1805)
Death: Moffat, near Dumfries, Dumfries-shire (18 September 1860)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1860-1862 vol 11 pp ix-x
References: A P Woolrich, 'Engineering Myths', review of Denis Smith, ed, Perceptions of Great Engineers: Fact and Fantasy in NR 1995 vol 49 pp 340-341
Notes: "Institution" inserted in a different hand as a correction for "Society"
